    • Constructor Detail

      • DropInstance

        public DropInstance(AmmoSet ammoSet,
                    boolean hasPowerUp)
        Initializes the immutable DropInstance object.
        Parameters:
        ammoSet - The ammo set present in the drop which can contain 2 or 3 ammos.
        hasPowerUp - The boolean flag tht signals the presence of a power-up card in the drop.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a power-up card is present and the ammo set does not contain 2 ammos or if a power-up card is not present and the ammo set dos not contain 3 ammos.

        o - the drop to compare.
        Returns:
